format_candidate_id_present.description: Candidate ID is present and not a placeholder

core_facts_policy_name.description: Policy Name matches key ('Employee Development and Advancement Policy')

summarization_complaint_desc.description: Complaint Description is summarized (non-empty, non-placeholder, >10 chars)
summarization_complaint_desc.submitted_value: Sarah Chen alleges she was denied selection for the internal “Future Leaders Program” because of her age after her manager, David Miller, indicated the program was intended for younger employees.

summarization_policy_section.description: Policy Section is summarized (non-empty, non-placeholder, >10 chars)
summarization_policy_section.submitted_value: Section 4.B states that selection for company development programs must rely on performance, potential, skills alignment, and business needs, and must be made without discrimination based on protected characteristics, including age.

key_statements_complainant_min_count.description: Complainant Key Statements meet minimum count (3)

key_statements_respondent_min_count.description: Respondent Key Statements meet minimum count (4)

key_issues_identified.description: Key inconsistencies/missing info identified (Comment contradiction AND Email issue)
submitted_value: Ms. Chen claims Mr. Miller referenced 'younger employees,' whereas Mr. Miller denies making that statement.
Ms. Chen says she sent a follow-up email that Mr. Miller states he did not receive, and the email has not been produced.
The detailed selection criteria or scoring documentation for the Future Leaders Program referenced by both parties is not included in the provided materials.
